properties.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties
properties.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 3 at 2:31PM PST until February 5 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Spokane WA
properties.description:
...Active Winter Weather Returns to the Area...

.A Pacific storm system will bring snow to all elevations of the
region beginning Tuesday evening and continuing into Wednesday
before snow levels rise during the afternoon and evening.

* WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10
inches possible.

* WHERE...Kamiah, Craigmont, Nezperce, Winchester, and Soldiers
Meadow Road.

* WHEN...From Tuesday evening through Wednesday afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous
conditions could impact the Wednesday morning commute.
properties.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY EVENING THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON
